계정을 삭제하시겠습니까?: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
- 계정 삭제 신청 7일 뒤 계정이 완전히 삭제됩니다.\n: - Your account will be permanently deleted 7 days after you request deletion.
- 계정이 삭제될 때에는 해당 계정으로 B.Link에 저장한 모든 링크와: - All links and folders saved in B.Link using this account will be deleted when the account is deleted.
- 계정이 삭제된 후에는 같은 계정으로 재가입하더라도 삭제된 정보는 복구: - Once the account is deleted, even if you re-register with the same account, the deleted data cannot be recovered.
- 계정 삭제를 철회하고 싶다면 계정 삭제를 신청한 지 7일이 경과하기: - If you wish to withdraw your account deletion request, please do so within 7 days from the date of request.
- 계정 삭제 철회는 [My] > [계정 관리] > [계정 삭제 신청]에: - You can cancel the account deletion request in [My] > [Account Manage] > [Request Account Deletion].
로그아웃 하시겠습니까?: Are you sure you want to sign out?
삭제_신청_일: If you cancel your deletion request within 7 days from {{deleteRequestDate}}, you can continue using B.Link with your original account information.

영구 삭제 하시겠어요?: Are you sure you want to delete permanently?
